sentences.en: Folly is the cloak of knavery.
Knavery may serve a turn, But honesty never fails.
sentences.cn: 欺诈或许暂时有用, 诚实却永远有用.

sentences.en: Knavery may serve for a turn , but honesty is the long run.
sentences.cn: 诚实也许很昂贵, 但决不会是廉价劣货.

sentences.en: Knavery may serve for a turn, but honesty is best at the long run.
sentences.cn: 欺诈也许能得逞一时, 诚实却能长存万世.

sentences.en: Knavery may serve, but honesty is best.
sentences.cn: 欺诈可能有用, 诚实却是上策.

sentences.en: Knavery may serve, but honestyis best.
sentences.cn: 欺诈可能得计, 但诚实总是上策.

sentences.en: Merucury, at his knavery, not only took the golden axe.
sentences.cn: 财神讨厌他不诚实, 不但将金斧头拿走.

words.tran_cn: 无赖；流氓；（纸牌中的）杰克
